account.title: Account
account.subtitle: Your profile, bookings and messages will appear here.

hero.title: We are the path to recovery
hero.subtitle: A city resort — without long trips

philosophy.text: is understanding and consistent work where the body and nervous system find balance again.
philosophy.sub: Focus, attention, consistency, and trust are the foundation for deep work with both physical and emotional health.

home.aboutP1: is a space for body and nervous system recovery.
home.aboutP2: We combine yoga therapy, massage, and bodywork so you can recover in your usual rhythm of life — without long trips or resorts.

sections.massageText: Therapeutic, Thai and visceral massage practices.
sections.trainingText: Formats for home, studio, and anti-stress.

massage.topLead: Therapeutic, Thai and visceral practices — gently, carefully, without rush.
massage.dir1Text: For back, neck, overall recovery and relaxation.
massage.dir2Text: Mobility, stretching, feeling light in the body.
massage.dir3Text: Gentle work with abdomen and breathing for balance.
massage.step1: Short intro and your request: what bothers you, what you feel in the body.
massage.step2: The process (gently, with respect to boundaries).
massage.step3: After-care tips: water / rest / light movements.
massage.bookText: Fastest way — message on Viber. Include: name, request, suitable days/time.

footer.tagline: A city resort — without long trips
footer.addressNote: Neil Armstrong St., 2D, 6th floor, room 614, BC "CONTINENT", Dnipro, Ukraine
